      • getURI

        public java.lang.String getURI()
        Return an URI for the entity. URIs are global entifiers used on the Web, among other things on the Semantic Web and in Linked Data, to reference documents and arbitrary other entities.
        Returns:
        URI if available, null otherwise

      • getTermLanguage
